0.1.name: wordpress/series-tag
0.1.description:
Adds a shortcode, series-tag, that you can use to create a list of all posts that are tagged with whatever tag you pass in.

Series Tag was written to allow you to tag a series of posts with the same tag, and then easily link between them without having to manually create links at the bottom of each post.

Links are created in date published order starting at the earliest date. All post titles are links to the permalink of the post except for the current post which just has its title displayed.

For help or more info, visit Nutt.net
